content: simple toy a little and cute panda in a dress i hope you ll love it materials and tools 1 sport 5 ply yarn the main colors yarn art jeans №05 light beige and №28 black for the dress alize cotton gold №385 green and yarn art jeans №35 yellow alize cotton gold №98 orchid и yarn art jeans №18 pale pink 2 the hook 2 00 mm 3 stuffing fiberfill 4 two black half beads 8 mm in diameter 5 cotton strong thread jute twine for the attaching of the arms and the legs 6 a needle with a big eye 7 a moment glue 8 a little bit white and pink thin threads
